text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The candidate answer discusses the Italian guardianship process ('amministrazione di sostegno') but completely fails to mention the mandatory involvement of the Pubblico Ministero (Public Prosecutor) or their role in protecting the interests of the incapacitated person, which is the specific requirement of this criterion.", "criterion_id": "67c9ae09-e84b-41b1-bf53-9d4ebd56afc3"}
